scenario.name: SIP_MESSAGE_from_OSP
scenario.send:
MESSAGE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: urn:service:sos From: "NG911 Test" <sip:+12025551212@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: [len]
SIP MESSAGE from OSP
